nodes.text: Karn was a Human male settler and farmer on the planet Muzara. He came to the planet with his family—his wife, his brother-in-law Tallov Kersk, Tallov's wife, his daughter Cavvie, and his nephew Vettle—in 4000 BBY. Karn and his family became the first settlers from the Brentaal League to encounter the planet's native species, the Muza.
